ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Level for Vox raid?
ygData.msgSnippet: I did ok at level 40 with over 200 cr and mr.  Didn t get feared a single time, resisted most of the damage breaths.  Only problem with going at low levels is,
ygData.messageBody:
I did ok at level 40 with over 200 cr and mr. Didn't get feared a single time, resisted most of the damage breaths. Only problem with going at low levels is, no matter what your cr and mr are, vox will recognize that you're very low level and will go after you hard sometimes. I got clawed about 5 times by her one time I was there...had a good cleric so I didn't die tho, think only one person in group did.

Err...so, the point is, if a raid needs bards, you can get in at level 40, but you better have over 200 resists if you don't wanna die in the first 5 seconds.
----- Original Message -----
From: Henrik Holm
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Friday, May 18, 2001 3:03 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level for Vox raid?


Yeah I think that sounds about right. I was 46th on my first and only vox
raid sofar. It was a disaster btw..
I have my own theory why the raid failed.
1. There was no minimum MR/CR demand
Thats it..
I myself was one of the people who did not realise just how important those
resists is. I was not clawed once. All damage I took was from breath and my
health dropped by 1/4 each time I dident resist! 4 unresisted breaths and I
was dead.
Mind you I played resist songs with my drum and had my buffed MR/CR well
above 100, but that was not enough.
Next raid I will only go if I can take my MR/CR (or HR if nafgen) to 100
unbuffed.

Musiker, bard o 47th songs, bertox (I better stop fooling around and get
leveling again, Windleaf is ahead of me :P *grin*)
http://pub9.ezboard.com/bcreatorspath
http://eq.guildmagic.com/guild_characters.cfm?ID=1598&sortby=character_name&
showroles=1



-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: 18. maj 2001 08:46
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Level for Vox raid?



Hi all,
I hit 42nd lvl last week and am looking for a serious raiding guild on
Rodcet Nife. I recently posted to one guild's website and got an answer
back that bards must be 45th lvl in order to be effective on a Vox raid.
Is this correct? Please let me know
Tyunes
